this is a game with which i have mixed feelings how to make a technically flawless game with great visual great music good gameplay though with a for my taste forgettable story a lack of originality botw and its idiosyncrasies and a huge and sometimes boring open world and above all with dopaminergic overstimulation carefully designed to induce addiction and not necessarily fun in short a frankenstein with an identity crisis cute but ordinary

have been playing since the beginning literally nothing to do here anymore five minute daily quests and ten minute event twice in a month no worthy heroes to level up nothing to farm at this point thought the anniversary event might help but it turned out to be quite unsatisfactory as well it is probably nice to play in the beginning but the late game is boring and unrewarding af edit since then they have made some quality of life changes and that is the only reason i add a star

amazing game it is easy to play and has fantastic graphic the only issue is it takes it a very long time to load cutscenes i think this is because it is built closer to a console or pc game but it still is fun however you cannot really call the limited character banners banners because the pity guaranteed five star summon does not guarantee the rate ip character you are going for

i love this game to bits but there are so many thing that could be fixed primo and five star character should be way easier to get the pity system is also strange i feel like a five star could at least be every it is not too hard but it is still a bit of a challenge for free to play players that do not play for hour on end every day

pretty decent at first wonderful graphic and amazing character design however as you level up it becomes increasingly difficult to gain any items for gacha summons and just to progress resin an in game item used to progress replen wish way too slow overall a fun experience but many fundamental flaws that ruin it

i came into this game really hoping to like it since everyone else seemed to like it but there is too many issues for me to really enjoy it first off is the awful quests you get sent on they range from ridiculously simple to almost impossible to complete without a guide secondly is the level scaling with the overworld mobs and monsters mobs get way too strong and dungeons become nigh impossible the story is interesting but it is locked behind your level and leveling up is a chore

endgame content is just abyss but the game gives you very little materials for powering up a character it is been a year yet artifact rng is still the worst the game is fun the first time you play it but once you reach the endgame there is nothing else to do you cannot even replay watch past archon story quests i will be uninstalling the game once my welkin ends i hope genshin will be better if i ever return

at first the game looked great but in time you start realizing all that is wrong with it is mechanic first of all there is the resin system it takes too long to regenerate and you need a lot of it to upgrade character weapons and artifact secondly there is artifact the amount of luck that you need to get a decent set is incredible not talking about substats even just getting the right main status may require weeks if you have bad luck unfortunately the letter limit stops me here

the artifact rate is trash the resin system is trash the only good about the game is the starting story the graphict and the character design three month of grinding at adventure rank and only one useable artifact the more you play the game the less fun it became at adventure rank plus for me it trash the fun was gone at the chinese new year the whole year playing the game only a few months is enjoyable

game is fun for the first few weeks great for playing instead of doing homework carried me through virtual class but around endgame game gets repetitive and boring the updates are not really fun and commissions are a chore the banners are all rerolls never anything completely new the weapons are all basically the same and the cooperative is poorly made free to play is okay but quite annoying after you get the limited banner character b constellationthe next one is a chance sad where the game is at

it started very well the base of the game is amazing character exploration world design music but mihoyo does not care for their player base and is unwilling to change the player rewards specifically for long term veterans are really non existent this is separate from the anniversary reward backlash the games rewards as a whole are so greedy and even though i have invested a lot of money and time i get back nothing i am nearing quitting because there simply is not any endgame content

genshin has grown to be a beautiful game with potential to blow every other game out of the water i have been playing it everyday since start but lately i already see the patterns of a game falling off the radar one it just does not feel like the game does not reward the players for their loyalty two the promotions are coming from the players and the reward for all the hardwork put in is close to nothing three the gacha system is terrible in this game just awful there is more sadly

i play on ps but i decided to review here i used to really love this game and i still do but after you reach adventure rank there is nothing to do anymore this game feels more like a chore than an actual game which really sucks because when i first got my ps the first game i have ever downloaded was genshin impact the quests are draining artifact drop rates are horrible so it takes more than a month to finish building a character gacha rates suck resin system is a huge issue thing need to change

it is been a year of playing this game and all i would say is that with recent updates unless you have high end mobile devices it is pretty hard to play the game as it tend to lag and crash cutscenes tend to go black screen and audio goes bonkers in terms of event i feel like it has been going downslope as time goes on there is no end game gradual progression is time gated and rng and event rewards feel so lackluster it does not feel like a reward at all

really bad rates for items this game has a gambling system that preys on children and adults alike the gameplay is nice but the system of getting character or new weapons are very poor the developers would require you to spend more than necessary compared to other gacha games the number of repetitive three star weapons is also very high with a limited number of options there is a higher chance of getting pieces of each three star weapons than completing a set of four star weapons one each bad

game is beautiful it has many unique thing but once you reach a higher adventure rank there is no content anymore it gets boring all you do is farm some domains and you cannot do much of that either because of the resin cap and that is it you log out there is no more fun left no content just nothing resin cap too high and content too low artifact farming takes months before you get even a single decent piece there are so many thing that could should be changed unofortunately

when i first started this game it was amazing lots to do big open world story quests but as time went on many of the issues became appare not electro reactions suck artifact rng is horrible no end game content bad resin system character weak on release character bugs never being fixed or addressed and a bunch of other qol issues after community submitting feedback for over a year nothing has changed and there has been no communication or acknowledgement of the glaring issues

this has to be one of the best games i played the graphic the music it is all awesome but there is no end game content well we could farm artifact and bosses but the resin system eight minute for a single resin is a bit too much decreasing the time to restore resin would be a nice most games would give awesome rewards on anniversary especially the first one then mihoyo decided to make the rewards gacha too good game bad company

i really did like this game on launch i played for a month straight forward a year later and everything became boring the event are unoriginal and a chore to do the story quests are inconsistent in pacing and content there was even one with a million plot holes and the combat is lackluster apart from character skills there is nothing enjoyable about the combat once you get used to the character you have everything gets old really quickly

two words anniversary rewards edit anniversary rewards got better but still boring as f because everything just feels like a chore i loved this game so immensely just three weeks back but nowi am just not enjoying it as much event are almost the same thing combat as button mashy as ever props to the graphic and music though inazuma was rushed in my opinion the enemy army and the rebels army was just or less guys going at it with each other it was more of a brawl than a war

game is free and some of the content is good i do not like the resin system and most of the artifact that i get from the dungens is garbage i feel like the drop rate is rigged for example if i try to farm the set i want alone in my world i do not get the set i want but if i farm it in my friends world i get it easily we me and my friend try to farm our sets by visiting one another its so frustrating and gems are so over priced i have spend money on this game but now i with did not

the gameplay is fun but improving your team in this game is extremely slow you need to kill the same boss a lot of times farm a large amount of gold exp and skill books so you need more than a month worth of energy to reach max level and level the skills to level nine level ten requires a very limited item for a single character do not forget about the equipment the rng for getting artifact is insane you could be farming for months to get a set of just decent artifact also spending energy

the content drought is real rewards are also highly scarce when you go up the world level it becomes frustrating unless you pay for it it will be very boring in the endgame and that is putting it lightly too much flaws that needs to be addressed such as the rng artifact system and resin and that is barely scratching the surface

the game was all fine and dandy in the beginning but they started getting greedy and lazy as the game went on the rewards for the anniversary are the obvious but other than that there are more issues than i can type with the word limit kokomi being an absolutely useless unit yoimiya having a broken kit the rushed story quests and the list goes on some are not even that hard to fix you can do better mihoyo

amazing artistic choices are clearly visible in the environment and the game has great storytelling and appealing multidimensional character though problems still arise the gacha system is very greedy the resin system inhibits endgame progression and the lack of account security is concerning to say the least edit mihoyo have clearly demonstrated that they do not listen to the player base whatsoever nor do they care about the current state of the game hopefully they can hastily resolve this predicament and reengage with the community because i can no longer recommend this game to anyone

i have played this game since october of without any amount of spending into account genshin impact itself at it is core is not a horrible game the graphic are good the controls are smooth the combos on each character and elemental combos are nice the story is interesting but extremely slow so far with the game being out a year now and only one new area out of three problems being resin being too restrictive for free to play players making farming generally horrible across the board

i had pre registered for genshin when it came out and loved it but when you get to some of the mid adventure ranks the grind gets tedious the drops do not increase get better very much and when they do event rewards they do not give you as much as they did when the game was fresh which is rather annoying because that means they want you to spend money on their gacha stuff which makes it harder to be free to play and still be good

how about google stops taking down my reviews first of all the state of the game has been disastrous for the past two patches new character released with bugged or underperforming kit existing character having bugs for months and no balance patches for a specific character since patch one two the latest main story quest has been extremely rushed leaving out too many detials and raising questions but in a bad way the quality of the game certainly dropped recently

a beautiful world and a good experience with fun gameplay at first but later in the game almost nothing i do feels truly rewarding the rewards are always so underwhelming and building new character is no longer as fun for me because of how difficult it is as a result of the games strange character leveling system and the tedium that comes with collecting the limited resources i would give a much higher rating if it was not for it is major flaws that become appare not in the endgame

this game is seriously amazing cross platform allows me to log onto my pc and continue playing when i want as long as you do not mind the gacha element it is a terrific free l open world zelda botw style adventure with a great story edit after a year of playing and grinding i find new five character way too costly in terms of play time and the rewards are so excruciatingly minimal cannot recommend this game anymore

for about a year now the game is now getting boring imagine having more character even though the game is still in its third nation inazuma standard character are now useless it looks like this now a pay to win game for you to enjoy hopefully some of the featured character can also be obtained through standard banners in the future like the four stars

this game is amazing it really is the amount of effort put in it is a beautiful landscape a world to escape to the storyline is amazing and had me hooked from the beginning and the character and their design are so fun to build and work with however it is been a year and there are inevitably problems that need to be solved at higher ars rewards get progressively worse the anniversary is also not helping encourage players nor solve these problems

i have been playing since launch and i have seen some major improvements on in game content throughout the updates however communication between the company and players has been steadily declining to the point where sincere feedback is not taken into account anymore it definitely influences the experience especially with a game in which people invest a lot of time and for many players money as well

the game starts out very good but it can become repetitive after a while the recent land added was underwhelming and felt rushed and the anniversary is the most lack luster i have ever seen in a game it is hard to believe it is a celebration when the company did not hing for it seems like they are content to put in the bare minimum to keep players engaged after the opening areas

played this game since last december and it was really good i did not mind the scarce resources too much since i played in moderation but at times i felt significantly limited by the resin system and artifact grind i ended up buying the monthly subscriptions to show my support for the game but the direction and attitude the company has taken towards their player base is patronising and unthankful to say the least apart from that i love the music and will listen to it on spotify from now on

the game has been nothing short but wonderful from the start however with the sheer amount of bugs that annoys the hell out of players naming the horrifying auto aim for bow user as an example has not been even mentioned in any bug fixes till today is a sign of how they cherry pick feedbacks from players the latest two one patch has a very obvious rush vibe to it be it in the story quest to the character development needless to say happy birthday mhy

the quality of the game content follows a linear curve along progression easy fun well done in the beginning by the time you get to end game it feels like playing a thinly veiled money making scheme the first nation was great the second was good the third released in two has been wholely lackluster exploration was fun for a while combat is designed poorly progress and the game throws more enemies at you use a shield or get hit into five other enemies hitting you into five more

beautiful game great story so far and runs smoothly on my phone samsung galaxy would love to see controller support for mobile added as it would be more comfortable to play that way edit over the past year there has been a large drop in communication with players bug fixes and rewards content is heavily gated behind resin energy making the level of farming needed difficult there is a great game here aside from these issues but it needs some serious work at this point

i started game when they were officially released in american and enjoyed a fair bit for a while then i lost interest and kind of stopped playing the game after almost a year i came back to play because my friend said there are a lot more thing to do which was true then i was anticipating an anniversary event to boost me up a bit and slowly started to see a lot of people talking about event being really mediocre and turns out it was not only i was baffled by amount of free with they give out amount of effort they put into anniversary event was just mind boggling in a worst way possible i think it would have been better if they just did not give out anything for free for the anniversary event and just put deep discounts on some of the stuff they offer would have been much better i cannot give anything lower than two star because i did actually enjoy the game and missing out on anniversary freebee will not probably make myself stop playing but this lack of communication ought to get some negative opinions and i think they are all valid

the game is beautiful and the combat system and character are fun the story started good but the recent inazuma arc was rushed and messy the developer has also slowly stopped communicating with the player base they have ignored common simple qol changes looking at you expidition user interface and common feedback on character kit this does not feel like the game i started playing a year ago i hope thing change for the better

needs controller support asap basic thing are easy to do but once you get into rapid character changing combos and tighter movement it becomes a hassle also i have large hands that cover the screen and imporant information gets covered like the bottom character in the party roster on the right side i play on a note ultra and cannot fathom how others play it on small screens

its a great game with beautiful graphic a storyline with substance and a decent or mediocre cooperative option depending on how much you like playing with others but there is just one thing that ruins the whole experience whenyou are knee deep in genshin impact the resin system is absolutely atrocious and limits the progression to upgrade your character by a mile it really differentiates a whaler between a free to play and in the middle are of course the goldf dolphins if only the resin system was not so bad it would be an absolutely amazing game there is just a lot of thing to be done but man the resin in just a knee capper just to clarify i am at adventure rank and have spent a bit of money on the game and not speaking out of my ass the resin system is just garbage

before i begin i wanted to like this game unfortunately there are so many small issues i had within the first minute i could not continue first option settings not available right away and when i did unlock them they were very lackluster second please put a lock on feature third please let us adjust control placements the movement pad is almost awkwardly too far towards the center also picking up items requires pressing the button in the middle of the screen very annoying

this game is fantastic starting off but grinds to an absolute halt after playing for the first few days you barely can progress as more and more roadblocks start showing up resin system needing enough money xp books materials to upgrade character and then eventually you will have to only be able to progress using keys unlocked by doing all your dailies for two days deceptive at best manipulative at worst gacha rates developers should really tweak all this because all the good press will sour

truly evidence that popularity does not suggest greatness the game is absolutely beautiful but nothing you do has any substance story is boring and unskippable there is little significance to exploration because you do not need most of the thing in the field food is not necessary to progress in the game enhancing gear just feels like an annoying obstacle that you have to get through just so you can keep progressing and perhaps the most irritating thing is how clunky the transition from activity such as swimming climbing etc are to going back to walking combat especially during timed challenges in fact it is almost like the climbing time challenges are showcasing how terrible the game is at guessing when the player wants to climb up and when the player does not want to climb up it is irritating during normal exploration as well since you will randomly climb up trees for no reason not to mention gacha rates are abysmali am still going to play this because i like gambling with free resources but to say that i like this game just because i plan to play it daily would be a complete utter lie

fin ed stormterrors lair i can safely say that early on the gameplay is an absolute blast however this game has a few fundamental flaws that ruin mid late game for me the game relies heavily on stun mechanic where the only way to defeat most enemies is to use continuous stunning attacks to prevent them from using their stunlocking combos resistance to attack interruption is an actual status the world levels up as you do making grinding difficult sometimes controls stop working

great story great graphic great locations but fix the multi player kick function it is stupid that you can be kicked out by players after multi player event finish i lost time and treasure due to this ridiculous feature needless to say this makes me not want to touch multi player until this is fixed

great game over all with an engaging storyline and cool character even if you do not purchase premium items and units the game is not unplayable yet i am not too far in and that could change however from a technical standpoint i have been having trouble running the app since the latest update at first it was just some stuttering frames at times but now just going into a menu is enough to crash the app entirely it was running fine a week ago but not anymore

pretty good game overall the gameplay is fun the graphic are beautiful and the music is amazing it is also the only open world gacha game and has a huge map to explore however it is unfortunately run by a company who does not care about it is community at all their refusal to properly address player concerns and fix issues that have existed since launch makes the user experience extremely frustrating

game starts as rather fun but the longer you play the more design and gameplay flaws you encounter overall experience can be summarized as following pros fun to explore world with various puzles decent story regular various event note due to the big differences in event gameplay mechanic some may be to your liking and some may not but considering overall variety it will still be a positive thing four smooth combat albeit lacking some necessary user interface elements cons daily routine becomes too repetitive and boring after finish ing world exploration character progression is horrible with excessive rng elements where it should not be in the first place looking at you artifact domains developers feedback is lacking and issues that have been bothering players since day are still unaddressed conclusion overall it may be ok to try this game for a bit just do not expect much in the long term

genshin is probably the most beautiful game you can play at the moment the univers is simply stunning the animations are great though i with they could be skipped after they have been seen once like old school rpgs this is one of the points where mihoyo fails to draw from its predecesors the character are generally well thought out and fun to discover where thing get hard is once you actually play the game the controls are absolutely horrible and controller support is nowhere in sight ios has had this for nearly a year now but some of the workarounds people have come up with on android have led to users being banned leaving you to contend with very underwhelming touchscreen controls you will also find yourself fighting the engine much more than the enemies there are a number of ways the game becomes anti immersive from the constant zooming in depending on your combat actions there should simply be a way to turn off auto zoom off but this illudes the devs completely to enemies walking off a preset area mid fight where they will walk back to their spawn point and regen one hundred percent hp and have you start the fight over something to drive you insane when fighting new and more powerfull foes all in all the game is good but some basic improvements would make it much more enjoyable

disappointing i have a relatively nice phone but this game lags like hell and heats up my phone real fast it is hard to use the controls on a phone too also the game is fun but its so annoying to have to level up several levels to get to the next story quest i with there was more help in game to help you learn combat skills and creating strong character the story is definitely interesting its just such a hassle to play

its a fantastic game very good on battles and story but it is lacking a lot of thing for starters there are cut scenes that need to be fixed in terms of when character come into play second the graphic are quite splotchy and does not look as nice when you get close it may also help to make it better for far less optimized devices edited

really enjoy this game two issues one ios has wireless controller support but android does not that is absurd please fix it two the process of pairing a save file between devices console and android for example has a very specific sequence that needs to be followed otherwise you have to beg customer support to unlink one device which takes potentially more than a week and a half this sequence is not explained clearly except for on forums which you go to after you have gotten it wrong

pros one it is a beautifully crafted world with a rich story and lovable character two the combat is fun and the exploration is enough to keep one adventuring for a while three you can tell that the developers put so much love into this game but the marketing division it is a mess and that leads me to cons one certain systems time gating remain broken since launch two rng on top of rng three predatory monetization four too much focus on money not enough on fixing content all in all solid

great game ifyou are here for the experience i would argue even the best one out there however if you were to stay here for long you gonna have to deal with a variety of problems from devs not fixing the most simple mistakes for years no joke to blantly ignoring their community when they are unhappy probably the most significant issue with this game is that it does not allow you to play whenever you want to play it afteryou are done with the quests so instead it becomes a second job

okay mobile game awful story writing with a lot of unecessary dialogue character are well designed and mostly balanced but some have years old glitch left unfixed while they continue to pile on new character e gigabyte dionas skill and burst still hit objects instead of enemies even when they are closer than the objects with there were more settings we could mess with obviously pay to win

i would have to say that this game is an exceptional one in terms of lore quality the beauty of going on adventure and experiencing fantasy however it is not friendly to new players there is a lot a new player must overcome in order to truly experience what a lot of us veteran players do new player lock out is a definitely driving those who with to enjoy the game away especially if they are bound to start off as mobile players this needs to be fixed and so does the resin system

definitely a good game i play it a lot on pc and i downloaded it for chromebook because google play said it was compactible which it is but sadly the graphic are set to be high as a default on mobile and it always crashes every time i enter the door and reach the loading screen the game really needs a settings option outside of the game or have default graphic values to be lower please do this change

im only giving it three because the actual game is good but the mobile version is a pain the hyakunin ikki event is one example it takes many tries to get enough points to get the first rewards and the reason is not that i cannot defeat the enemies it is that the enemies take an actual minute to spawn all the time trials in the mobile version have this issue too the objectives do not spawn in under ten seconds the lag cutscenes in quests are unbearable when you actualty care about the story

fun at first however not much is explained very well for new players leaving most people to find out through trial and error open map puzles have hardly any hints on how to do them and the rewards for those puzles and the entire game for that matter are very lackluster gear for character can take months depending on your luck gameplay and visual are nice but take up so much space overall rng based gameplay for anything you actually need to play

i love this game fun game play good map but the only problem is it takes too much space this is like the only game i can have it takes storage to download every good part of the gameplay but i seriously cannot get one other app i really hate that part of genshin but although it takes too much space it is a fun game if it is possible please lower the amount of space genshin impact uses to run smoothly or i will not be able to talk to my friends thank you

great to a point i played this on phone and playstation although there is a point where you get stuck unless you have a lot of friends that play too one area you cannot complete without a full team of players there needs to be guilds to complete for those who have friends just not interested in this type of game otherwise your stuck and cannot progress ending all the work you have completed which is a huge downfall for the game itself if you can get multiple friends to play cool go for it

i usually play it on my laptop and i liked it so much i wanted to play on my mobile device until i removed several apps and pictures videos and still was not able to download it the amount of space this game takes up for mobile is unreal to the point of litterally being unrealistic it takes up about one four one three of my phones total storage however on pc it is a wonderful game and if you have the storage capacity i encourage you to try it the graphic and fighting mechanic are wonderful

updates suck on android i have done pre downloads and even new versions always mess up getting on and i have to completely uninstall reinstall the game sometimes like now even that does not work soi am writing this since i cannot even get on the game i love the game in general but getting resources to get new character is extremely time consuming considering they only give you five to primo for a majority of the quests ps is easier by far for both gameplay and updates

i do not like giving it a three star it is one of the best and most advanced games on the store right now but it does not justifies the space it takes the game is already big but also a lot of unnecessary stuff is takes up space even after they are over event cinematics etc there should be option to not download or remove this unnecessary stuff the game can be adjusted better for mobile too even the best phones turns into demo of hell after minute of playing this

its awesome i would give it a five star if there were not any problems in my game play everytime i play of course i log in so the problem is i do not know how many minute i can play but everytime i do smth like fighting enemies the game starts lag and the screen turns back and kicks me out and when i am in cooperative and that happens all my progress is restarted i hope this gets fixed because i really wanna play genshin while on the go

gacha impact is a game where you collect scannotily clad mostly under age women and some dudes and fight monsters the game is great gameplay is responsive and flashy the game falls apart pretty quick pay your time or pay with money to make stupid inconveniences go away once progression is really important in games and this game wants to monetize that to encourage you to spend as much money as possible games get so much better than this

i really love the game and the fun gameplays and event that they have to offer however i would love to recommend with others to play the game i have some problems whenever i play it for a short amount of time the game ends up lag completely and crashes not only the app but my phone as well i have to wait for about minute with the screen of a character i last played with their attacks and skills up still in a time freeze this happened too many times andi am worried for future players

played in the beginning left for a while wanted to get back in for the anniversary but they really dropped the ball for anniversary with the weak ten pull this game has a fairly unreasonable pay structure for rewards the lack of resin has always been a huge problem this game was well received initally and i had high hopes it is too bad there have not been positive changes to improve enjoyment for the players overall

would love it if the game was optimized better it takes up quite a lot of space heats up the phone eats up the battery and lags heavily on slightly older phones a friend had to unfortunately drop this game altogether due to the increasing size andi am worried many others including myself will be affected as well all in all a great game love the open worldness and gorgeous atmosphere alongside wonderful music storyline is engaging with promising character to boot

had to change my review though this game is made well filled with wonderful character and story the game has slowed down to a crawl content is slow coming event are lackluster and boring the event that are fantastic should be simply in the game available to everyone at anytime it is sad that some of these event will never return resulting in new players in missing out on all the fantastic lore provided

it is my favourite game and i am very dedicated to it but there is a flaw in the game which bugs the hell out of me the wangshu quest disables co operative mode until completion but for me and many others the quest is not operating properly so i have to sweep it under the rug but that is impossible due to the fact i need co operative mode to make the game enjoyable

this game has a lot of issues that are hard to excuse but the parts that are fun are fun it would take a lot of time to get into all of the issues but to touch on some of them it seems like the character that are struggling and need help will not get it inconsistent mechanic that seemed a randomly apply to one character but not all there is a lot of dead time do not pull in the weapon banner unless you intend to spend a lot of money rewards for completing quests seem really lackluster

tl dr be prepared to be disappointed ifyou are a gacha player who likes to grind play a lot but in general its very enjoyable many problems appeae in the form of of end content and the energy timegated system to get artifact progress for better gear the story is very enjoyable but do not expect something well written a lot of character problems event rewards are okay but itself very boring to play there is no replayable content side quests can become very tiresome and the gacha is insane

after playing for one year genshin impact is an amazing game at the surface level great world building character design combat system story and graphic however going deeper into the game it has many glaring issues that have not been addressed lack of endgame content high effort for low rewards qol changes resin system artifact rng overpriced gacha and the recent downgrading of story and character the game becomes increasingly disappointing and a daily chore in the end

edit one of the greatest open world animethetic action rpgs of this time world character design is amazing and a joy to explore while listening to enchanting orchestral osts combat and grinding gets abit boring after a while but that is due to endgame but most of the latest character need extreme balancing and any new players will be sol until they spend hour of main story extra weeks of grinding adventure rank to be able to upgrade them mats are adventure rank region locked this system makes no sense

i am new to this game so far i enjoy playing it my only suggestion is that they must not bar adventurers from leveling up their ranks because god it is so hard to do the ascension task at level though my heroes are at a higher level with the right element to combat the electro hypostasis still my heroes were underpowered it is so tiring to play and deal with them over and over again you should also consider hero replacements if your deployed heroes were all down haha

it is a great game but it would be greater if it has controller support another issue in the mobile version is that sometimes objects takes a long time to load and the interact button is sometimes late also the resin refresh rate feels like forever and the cost for just one with is just too much with those odds of winning a four five star character

the game is so good early on and i have no major problems with the gacha for enjoyments sake it is free to play friendly there is also a small subscription option welkin bp for low spenders which is good in my personal opinion as well however resin is a major problem with this game specially at end game you get your character you pull and get weapons then what to do with them it is frustrating that you can only fight a couple of bosses a couple of domains then you get random drops which do not amount to any upgrade andyou are done for the day at this point it is a daily login app not a game

a beautiful game many amazing character and places to visit powerful weapons however sometimes the lack of communication and basic rewards with fans is frustrating especially adventure rank rewards the amount of resin needs to be adjusted as well as artifact rng we also need more reasons to play for more than minute later into the game the only thing you end up doing is logging in doing commissions burning resin and logging off it often just feels like a chore

i enjoy the game but the rng gacha system being on basically everything really pulls it back it is even on the stats of the gear itself and there is no way to change them so you just have to continue griding and pray more cooperative thing to do would be very nice balancing for character is not the best also no controller support for android after a year really sucks all that said it is very pretty and nice music story can be good to

honest review game is beautiful honestly have not seen mobile games come close in terms of graphic and music score for beginners the game is fine but as you progress you realize the multiple issues this games has resin needs adjustments and the higher ups should listen to the community in terms of these issues it is also very free to play but pulling a character especially one you want is very difficult and expensive especially when you have decide between saving primo or not

it gets very repetitive after a while and dialogues are way to long every new character you get is unusable unless you would be able to upgrade them to the same level as other character and upgrades takes a lot of time the android version does not support controller which is not very optimal

good game but the resin system needs a rework it was fine when the game first came out due to limited amount of character but seeing as we have double the amount of character to farm for now the resin regeneration and cap needs to be much higher than before also the game is also quite lacking in end game content with only the spiral abyss dps check at the moment if there could be some kind of boss raid cooperative content would be much appreciated

awesome game beautiful art style huge open world map incredible ost really nice character but keeps accumulating bugs who never get fixed or addressed the history writing recently got real rushed and bad character comes half baked on gameplay and their relevance on history is almost non existent even side character have way more relevance and impact than the playable ones additionally the lack of proper communication throw down the mayor positive aspects of the game unfortunately

the gameplay world and music is fantastic but the lack of communication and community interactivity lately has been the most abysmal i have seen with a gacha this game started out very strong in these aspects but they have deteriorated at an alarming rate i do not mind the lack of rewards for anniversary but i just with there was more fanfare more communication and transparency acknowledge problems instead of trying to sweep them under a rug and say they are going to be fixed

while the game itself is not bad it has become boring where there are less stuff to do there are a lot of re works of many character that needs to be done i would also like to address the underwhelming reward of the anniversary where everything are web event and less in game content that has a few rewards

you are doing great with the map expansions puzles are fun finding secret hidden chest is fun doing hidden quest is fun but exploring the map with maxed out character is boring because you can do one hit per kill please add high risk zones for maxed out character make us feel that we still need healers while exploring map

the beginning experience is fun but at endgame the content becomes very dry and there is nothing meaningful to do outside of waiting for energy over time the devs started to get more careless and stopped acknowledging player feedback as much they have ignored multiple bugs with character that have been there for a long time and now with the anniversary they have essentially ignored the player base entirely sad to see aside from that the character are pretty cool

great game but there is still room for improvement please raise resin from to and condense resin from five to ten more cost halving opportunities for weekly bosses artifact sets are hard to complete please implement a rotation for the pieces the game visual and soundtrack are ten out of ten it is just that if we go into the stage of filler patches again then we need the resin system to improve play at your own risk this game has greedy management

it was a really fun game however the endgame content felt like chores everyday there is no more adventure and fun and challenge besides the spiral abyss which is relatively easy for some but still rewards are so cheap and even for a gacha it still requires you to put so much money and effort into even getting to their pity which does not even guarantee the five star you want sometimes the soundtrack and graphic are amazing but on what has happened during these past few weeks is really bad

a fun blend action rpg adventure game with rather impressive visual soothing soundtrack solid stories and fun character the game is just stuck with a very tedious boring and sometimes frustrating endgame where it ends up being a massive grindfest and a highly predatory gacha system where all but five of the highest rarity units are limited to event specific banners also the company is mad stingy with its anniversary rewards

used to be a really good game but the recent quests feel rushed and the plot was anti climatic it is starting to feel superbly unfriendly to free to play players and rewards have been disappointing there is nothing much to do daily and farming rarely gives anything good lore in the game now feels stale and even though they created a good setting for inazuma the promotional posters and built up suspense was useless by the end of the quest

developer does not listen to feedback despite putting out a survey after every major update several character are completely worthless or suffer from bugs which remain unfixed six months after their release resin system heavily limits gameplay as almost everything relies upon it would rate higher if they simply addressed issues since the base gameplay is actually very good

very good game easy to hook have some small issues which i always feedbacked but seem like not to fix anytime soon music and gameplay is great story character and mechanic system are good at first but become unbalanced and go slightly downhill maybe because of rushing or low quality control while the game itself is great it is still have a lot of drawback recommended to gacha veteran and lover

been playing for a year now and all i can say is that the resin system needs improvement as for it is hard to farm for artifact and materials with resin per day as well the rewards are somewhat stingy not enough for with wish which makes you pay real money for the wanted character weapon great storyline and graphic really like how a open world game that does not really limit you to something is finally on mobile

initially the game was awesome hands down it was the best i had ever played wrt graphic scenery character and story the only disappointment is not the rewards but the lack of consideration towards the player base the story and world building is hands down the best but the pace at which updates roll are slow but frequent the amount of time it actually takes for the story to move on is too long and tires out many people like me minimal spender and if you miss a day you feel like you have lost something precious you have been building up i do not want more rewards hecki am fine with what we already have but please put more lore and give character like lisa kaeya and amber more love so we can like them for who they are as character and not the colorful numbers that pop up on the screen oh and where is ludi harpastum we were supposed to get that too right

the game is great beautiful scenery and music the story is great character are amazing and its a very unique and enjoyable but as you progress there is lack of any sort of end game content except for the spiral abyss which please instead of making floor and worse just add more floors or add something new also please communicate with your players and listen to what they want its a lovely experience here and we want it to be better thanks

the graphic are beautiful the world is fun to explore the character design is amazing the music is also very nice it is a fun game in general but it needs a lot of effort to do stuff that just give you low rewards like the first anniversary you can give free stuff for promotions you can give a free four star for an event but sth better than ten with wish for one whole year of playing is enough at least fix some bugs or improve some aspects

edited first review might be too emotional love the games gameplay and music there are non event activities you can do to pass the time eg do music hangout at a sims house hide and seek event come by at least once or twice a week though cannot still say much more about the games anniversary games lore is very interesting though the latest chapter is a bit lacking of sense there are also posts that are still not implemented distributed eg wings from the event from a fast food chain switch version of the game

visually stunning game and amazing soundtracks however most of the aspects of the game namely the domains relies heavily on rng which is quite frustrating the current pace for which the main story progresses is also slow the resin system whilst a normal feature in gacha games is severely limiting in genshin you can use up a days worth of resins in less than ten minute but the greatest downside of this game is the way the company handles rewards and compensations which is lackluster

i have been playing since launch and have faithfully played until i hit the burnout wall for a couple months before archipelago update i have spent way more than i like to think on this game andi am not terribly proud of that ultimately this is a decent good game great art amazing visual fun but the greediness from the gacha rates the resin system the artifact rng its sucking the life out of the player base add in the lack of endgame content and the lack of rewards and its a disaster

i mean the skeleton of the game is good solid gameplay good story exploration but then there is the really bad systems like resin gacha in general artifact which makes the game just way less fun to play additionally the rewards in the game are not the best to say the least

late game makes you with the company was not so stingy voice acting is good quality in every language runs okay on a galaxy but is better on pc albeit with locked fps character are cool cutscenes are extravagant graphic are amazing exploration is a blast and grinding is fun it is a shame about the greed and the lack of rewards

repetitive after you finish all the current story updates but inbetween updates you can farm primo to save for new character story and character are great but with we could somehow breeze through the time consuming non important daily commissions i between updates also with there was an easier way to keep track of your with wish like a counter or something in the banner pages so we can easily see when we get our guaranteed five star

i really with i could give this game a five star rating the open world is phenomenal and fun to explore as someone who is now in the late gamei am trying to entertain myself with photo taking of the beautiful scenery etc however ever since the two update thing have really gone downhill the english stream for the two one update was delayed by one and a half hour character have been released despite having seemingly unfin ed kit and now the anniversary rewards mihoyo listen to the fans

overall the game is already good but the mechanic sucks please consider removing or decreasing the amount of resin needed for artifact since it is one of the highest resin consumer on the game the artifact system is based purely on luck to get the artifact needed with good stats and sub stats please also consider changing the daily commission the rewards should differ based on difficulty ten for the easy and for hard commisions it may be randomized or fixed so its more rewarding

genshin impact is a great adventure without an entry barrier exploration is similar to breath of the wild collecting climbing gliding however combat is a fluid dance b with managing your partys abilities and chaining attacks the character are all distinct with unique personalities the story filled with beautiful cutscenes lore and voice acting a visually impressive game edit decreased score due to low gacha rates and freemium currency i have hit soft hard pity for over half a year

i have played this game since release and i loved it exploration of a beautiful world amazing character interesting lore but afteryou are done exploring and finish the quests there is nothing late game is a never ending grinding hell and that is it there is nothing left to do they keep releasing character worth hundreds of euro or months of grinding and saving full of problems that they will not even address the story does not make any sense anymore the devs do not care and it shows

it was really exciting at first but now the storylines and character are getting too boring the new event are not unique nor enjoyable once you reach a certain adventure rank the game becomes boring and repetitive it is getting very obvious that the games focus is on getting new players and does not care about its old players

game is amazing at first but the more you play spend the worse it gets they have a lot of security and balance issues at the moment which is making many of the player base weary of playing the game and many unwilling to spend and communication on these issues have been poor or poorly received game currently has a lot of progression strain on their stamina system resin specifically mora gold and hero xp getting a new hero takes two weeks of grinding to get them at a playable place then you need to spend even longer farming gear this leaves you at a place of always needing to farm for the future but the game is still great at it is base you can do everything but their end game three tower stages that reset bi monthly you can do those stages but will require a lot of careful investment it is a solid hour of content more if you do not rush through it until the security issues are fixed i would think before spending money otherwise give it a shot for a while but keep tabs on the communities of the game reddit is a good one but can be an echo chamber at times until at the least the security issues are fixed i cannot justify more than three stars and i only stand with that because of how much enjoyment the games world has given me since launch

genshin impact is really fun in the early game the ability to explore the huge landscape is pretty unrivaled for a free game that even runs on mobile but in the end the monetization lets it down if you can stop yourself from caring about getting new character then genshin can be fun for a long time until you get into the late game where thing become quite the grind but if you start to look forward to rolling for character and if you want one in particular you will be disappointed

a pretty good gacha game great visual but the open world can get a bit barren since there are not a lot of fun thing to do gameplay is decent but a bit slow gacha system is okay character visual design is good but a lot of the kit design are horrible especially for some character not generous with their premium currency and the daily grinding is a bit too long and boring

i use to love this game it has an amazing storyline and beautiful landscapes and character on the other hand i hate the new update size aside fontaine came out too soon before new map released slowly and gave players more time to explore and complete quests but now they are releasing map every other update this discourage players from playing and intimidate new players one bit of advice i would like to say to new players is to take your time and do not force yourself to catch up

it is a very good game for a while but now the game has gotten very boring getting a new character used to be very exciting but now it just meant that we need to grind for days the combat system felt lacking compared to other rpg maybe you could add stuff like blocking more interesting combo combination and other mechanic there is also to much time based progression that forced you to wait for days and on top of that there is also luck factor making it very unpredictable and boring

the game is very great i have never played any mobile game with the same experience as genshin impact the gameplay is amazing and innovative while the storyline is great and fits well with the theme one issue i have with this game is optimization the game occasionally crashes and runs very slow even if my phone is brand new i would have gave a full score for this game if it were not for the optimization issues which i hope could be fixed by the next update

really good rpg game have not experienced such fun mobile rpg in a while there are problems in this game when you try to pick up item interact the popup button delays like two seconds and it is very frustrating in the act of dragonspine challenge experienced this since earliest version and then there is a problem with the audio where it crackles and sounds very lag while the gameplay itself is not it would improve players experience if these problems were fixed

one thing for certain that mihoyo is really delivering a high quality game especially for a mobile game from the world building to the music voice acting etc though being hold back by the annoying traversing system in the big open world hit or miss story or even the simplicity of the combat system if you are a casual gamer just want to enjoy some cute anime games this is just for you

amazing game amazing visual amazing story amazing everything though there are two thing that made me give three stars being that the game is barely optimized for mobile play if you do not have a middle high end phone you will be watching a slide show i cannot even roam the world without it freezing every second or two resin system for those who does not play the game resin is basically energy and if you are gonna grind this resin will be the thing that will be limiting grinding by a lot

this game is nice the character design the animation the graphic and especially the ost but this game is super boring in the late game lack of event there is no halloween event and no halloween theme etc lack of rewards i know that it is casual game for players to relax no pressure no rankings etc but this game is too boring to me

this game is one of my favorites for its unique and well written character the immaculate story and lore the amazing music and beautiful scenery however this game has some key issues that need to be addressed if it is going to keep going on resin artifact system is awful poor communication between devs and players the surveys do not do much from my observations and the character keep getting worse from what i have seen and the gacha system is questionable at best

the game itself is good but bringing it to phones is a bit of a stretch i set every option to the lowest and fps to and i still had an experience closer to fps on an samsung although i do have the exynos variant also drains the battery way too fast for some reason unplayable on mobile great on consoles and pcs edit anniversary is quite disappointing and not enough yoimiya infusion is also not kept when stitching character

i played this game since the day all i can say is that the world itself is amazing and vast and i quite like the story a lot i enjoyed exploring every nooks and crannies before moving on to the next map sadly it became repetitive in terms of farming for better gears with a limited amount of resin to spend unless i spend some money to buy for more character became bland like a rehash of skills from other character only with a different look and rarity hopefully mhy can get me excited again

i played this game a lot and i like this game a lot when i hit adventure level the difficulty spiked enemies started doing pretty massive damage which on its own no big deal get good no pay to win ceiling or anything like that but the janky controls and poor camera tracking made a really enjoyable game probably the best mobile game i have ever played so frustrating running the open world is still solid but boss fights are almost unplayable i might try pc but i cannot do mobile

while the game itself is fun it is ruined by the resin stamina system and the multiple rng layer on artifact with that said the event they come up with are pretty fun and the character memorable edit after more than a year end game still does not exist they do pump new zones frequently enough to keep you busy though and exploration is really fun

only three stars i have been playing it for a whole year now but ever since launched the game had been so lag the drops cannot be seen the mobs will not die and you cannot change character immediately even though you have a green ping its so hard to play now please fix this issue asap other than that the game is fun i really like exploring the new map enkanomiya it seems interesting that is all

tldr pro exploring a fun combat mechanic enjoyable even for free to play casuals cons lag heat other issues on mobile resin security long review what i enjoy the most of the game is exploring the open world you can climb on every vertical structure as a person who always try to climb thing in game this is although the ease to climb everything does bite you back when in combat near trees or fences puzzles are not too difficult for an average person battle mechanic elemental reaction is really fun to execute as well enemies are quite lovable since they have their own quirks for example sleeping and snoring at their camps dancing around bonfire the ice mage jumping and mocking when you get frozen grr additionally it is possible to play without spending your money for gacha you can obtain currency primo for your roll by doing thing in game but of course it will involve some grinding the cons however mostly come from mobile platform pov it is difficult to play in mid low ranged phone due to lag and heat issues even on lowest setting god forbid if battle takes place at a field with burnable grass everything starts lag because of the lag using archer character is near impossible in mobile i cannot move the reticle in aiming mode during combat or challenges sometimes it can move but only pixels the camera rotation is horrible i would like to see the enemies while attacking instead i get the grass covering my entire screen or have the camera pan towards my character instead the enemies the on screen action button particularly sprint and jump are too close i feel like very often i accidentally tap jump instead of sprint during battle that is all for the issues on mobile port however resin requirement should be less instead of for example or change the replen time to be quicker the price for gem purchase is ridiculous trust me i have played games with gacha system for the past ten years the price is expensive with the very low rates account security is very weak look it up if it is not for this i would have give the game

needs controller support this is a great game especially considering at a mobile game i love everything about it but its just a real bummer there is no native controller support i would really like to see that in an update currently using octopus to have my own controller overlay but it just is not the same as real controller support please add and will change to five stars

the foundation for this game is amazingly good the combat feel very fluid and fun the story is interesting especially since this is free to play game what holds this game back other than the predatory microtransactions is the fact that after the year it became clear that they have no intentions of fixing any long standing issues with this game to this day there is no end game to speak of on most days your gameplay consist of ten minutus of doing some daily chores collect rewards and then log off for a day in short this game is still a good choice if you want to play it over two weeks or so than just drop it for couple of months until there are some new content to play with for me it is kinda sad because i want to play this game but there is nothing to do at all in this

played since it was released super fun game in the early stages lots to do and explore but the grind for artifact and level up materials gets old recent event have changed my view of this game and now it feels more like work than fun log on do daily and event just so i do not miss out on somthing and feel a bit empty at the end of my session

if anyone is going to read this one best strap in its a long one i find it hard to figure out where to start overall i like this game more so than anything i love the story in general my personal favourite and so far the height of genshin impact for me is everything to do with the main storyline of the inazuma region you can tell the developers tried delivering a story that was intriguing and epic and it was conveyed very well from the start of the game thing have taken interesting turns but in the inazuma leg of the story thing really pick up the music design really accompanies this beautifully and i can honestly say that the music production of genshin impact deserves stars amazing so then why is my score for genshin impact i often play games for their story even games in which i do not like the mechanic the story may heavily outweigh the bad of such a game and make it an overall positive experience for me sadly the reason my score is kind of mediocre is that the game itself is becoming harder and harder to sit through i have played genshin impact actively almost every single day since a week after it is release exploring new regions was great but the interest in such has waned especially since the latest updates for tsurumi island and enkanomiya before that the actual release of inazuma itself was no longer as fun as the hype before it came the best i can sum almost everything in genshin impact up is its fun at first but quickly turns into a chore something you do more so because you should rather than wanting to because it is fun i feel like this year lantern rite event was underwhelming no i am not talking about the rewards more so that last year was fun and heartfelt and cinematically great where this year was not really interesting and the fireworks were underwhelming everything in genshin becomes a chore you have your daily quests some of which you have to do five times to get an achievement but only appear once in a blue moon making getting that primo achievement a test of patience you have your battlepass rewards which are kind of just chores that feel unrewarding you have your exploration which if you havent gotten everything percentage yet kind of boils down to walking around aimlessly trying to figure out what chest you missed which i was excited about exploring for example dragonspine but sheer cold was introduced then making it an inconvenience to actually explore freely on tsurumi island they introduced new enemies but the combat always plays out the same new enemies and new gimmicks are not a real challenge its a new annoyance enkanomiya seemed to have new lore behind it but it was just sort of tossed in in my opinion with enemies at literally every turn constantly inhibiting your progress of exploring and the combat is basically mash left mouse button and sometimes e or q dodging is barely necessary if you have a healer or a healthy supply of food new enemies have new gimmicks or are different versions of previous enemies its nice beating a new enemy but after a week they are just as easy to overcome as other enemies or they feel like another annoyance i love genshin impact story i want to play the story but every update that does not release inazuma or now sumeru just feels like a long bothersome wait to get there i like most of the character though a lot of them begin to suffer typical anime stereotypes which is seeping into the hangout event as well i thought gorou was going to be interesting but his hangout event revealed mighty little about him and was yet again a list of small chores walk here defeat some hilichurls like million times before talk to this guy walk there done to me genshin impact is rapidly losing the appeal it used to have at first i loved it but everything becomes a stale new chore i had this with warframe years ago too eventually there is too long a wait for the story to continue and everything in between is just a big meh even though you with for it to do well

now that the anni stuff is over let review gi at its best this game has an incredible world to explore finding new areas is always so much fun even if the rewards for doing so are not much top this with simple yet serviceable combat and top notch audio you have what makes for a good game but it is held back by two major flaws a mediocre story and lack of end game content once you have beaten the game and gotten a handful of character there is almost nothing to do mihoyo do better

good game bad progression up to rank you will spend your time in the story then you will get into the horrible grind that is mandatory to progress and take on newer content artifact are completely rng with the worse stats being the higher chance making the game a chore the company does nothing to fix this and also does not listen to player feedback about the insane grind and poor progression systems the rewards from event and quests are the bare minimum as well

it is an amazing game both lore and gameplay wise the action and combat in this game are really good although in mobile the graphic are a bit hard to control aiming and shooting are really difficult and sometimes even simple thing like activating a wind glider becomes a bit difficult although if you are going for the story you should download this game if you want a smoother experience i would recommend a computer for better gameplay

this game is absolutely stunning and the designers have really outdone themselves character are engaging and interesting story is intriguing and well thought out graphic are stunning it is a little confusing navigating the game at first because there is not a lot of guidance but that encourages the player to run around and explore so why the four stars the massive amount of space it takes up on my phone almost thirty gigabyte is forcing me to uninstall unfortunately gonna see if my laptop can run it

i like genshin impact it is fun the story is never boring the art and character are amazing but i do have one problem i feel like the game takes up way to much data there is almost no way to play it unless you have basically zero data taken up maybe if there was a way to change it i would be happier with my experience

absolutely love genshin the storyline is great and the graphic are amazing i rated it four out of five stars because the apps takes up a lot of storage which makes the game lag when loading in new areas on a side note after the seven update my phone did not have enough space to play the game anymore and i do not have a pc to play on either however i do have a chromebook the issue is that genshin is not supported on chromebook so can the developers please make the game accessible to other devices

it is an amazing app but it is getting hard to continue to play on mobile it is taking up a bunch of storage infact after two point seven i will have point zero four gigabyte left plus as new character come out older character do not have reruns as much ex kazuha and the lag on mobile is frustrating but i do like the idea of an ascension quest it helps me prepare for higher leveled enemies and lets me stay at a world level i am comfortable at the graphic are also absolutely wonderful they are beautiful

been playing for almost years now and i can safely say amazing game and the graphic is absolutely phenomenal one thing though if you like collecting character but you are not willing to spend money on the game well it is going to be a thorny ride for you otherwise you still can clear most of the games content with lower rarity character

overall it is a super fun game it is got me practically addicted only problem that i have is the amount of space it takes up no matter how many thing i delete it still continously says that i have insufficient storage because of this i play on my playstation other problem is when i am close to adventure rank sixty there is not much to do but commissions event or farming it gets boring now and then to log on but not being able to do much but other than that i love the game so much

just perfect great story simple controls awesome graphic and gaming in general with a cool new open world cooperative multiplayer rpg anime style kind of concept i just need a more powerfull device to get back to playing it it is just impossible for me to ever get tired playing it but still just like any other game this one provides some advantage for those willing to pay for special items basically those generic in game purchases wich are a bummer but anyway

it is an amazing game the visual are beautiful the music is so emmersive the storyline is awesome everything about it is perfect except for the fact that it does not work well on mobile devices i mostly play on my phone and most everything works fine but when it comes to a cut scene it keeps freezing and it will not work on my laptop other than that everything is amazing and it is and awesome game would totally recomend if you do not mind the cut scene thing on mobile have the right laptop

it is fun and beautiful the fact that it is free is insane however some of the tasks i with had more direction like a help section for tasks or a hint since some tasks were way easier than how long it took to complete also i with the tutorial was available at all times sometimes i have not been online in some time so i forget some key info that would help other than this it is absolutely a five

it takes a super long time to load i hope they make the software easier to process on some devices because it takes so long to load and it runs very slow on a decent computer other than that the game is amazing its easy to pick up its worldbuilding is phenominal you fall in love with the character and it is free it does not free a ton of space though lmao

it is definitely an amazing experience especially with the details of lore and the different settings however i think that the cooperative experience can definitely be enhanced and unfortunately the game is not suitable for all devices like mobile because the game takes up too much storage otherwise it is a really cool game

the new patch will no longer let me log in i am stuck on the download page and have no idea what to do with this i really do love this game the stories are incredible the character design are impeccable and the event are so fun however it can become really competitive as once you grow your worlds levels it gets pretty hard and can get very annoying otherwise i love the game and i am very invested even when it gets hard i simply keep coming back i swear it is a addictive lol

i downloaded it because of the hype and i have played other mihoyo games before but not for long because i cannot get into the character rotation it just is not my type of battle system so i already failed at the third temple lol when the wind riding and tile jumping stuff becomes the main hurdle to overcome in order to progress without finish ing this crucial quest you cannot go on in the game however graphic animation story voice actor music the many game modes it is all absolutely fabulous

it is a great game but i am only giving it four stars the game is very open great character storyline is awesome hints of romance etc my only problems are some quests are very annoying to complete because it dosnt actually show you where to go and it gets frustrating so maybe more hints would be nice my biggest issue is the adventure rank as i said it is a great game with lots to do but the adventure rank leveling gets very tedious and annoying please fix it thanks

i love this game sure it can get a little boring when you have been playing for an year but it is still fun there is a lot you can do but i do have some minuses first of all i think primo are way too hard to get sometimes there might be good event and all but otherwise it is almost impossible to get many without spending money and also it takes way too much storage on phone that is why i play it on playstation

a very nice game really love the design gameplay story and many more i hope that you guys can continue doing the good work personally the issue i found about the game is storage took about four of my phones storage other issue is the combat camera settings very hard to control because sometimes while in combat the camera glitched through walls or floor so its hard to fight sometimes overall quite enjoy the game

the game is fantastic amazing graphic story line character open world type of deal and tons of thing to do the cons if you do spend money on the game the best value for a buck is actually the nine ninety nine one if you were to spend dollar if you purchase the pack three times you will actually get more gems then if you were to just purchase the pack something they should consider changing there are more two cons just not enough space to type them out

the gameplay and graphic are extremely excellent compared to other free games depending on your device of course the design of the newest character are extraordinary and the cinematics are just mind blowing however this game lacks of creativity if we are talking about the event and the rewards we get are as disappointing but whats fun about this game is not the event but playing with your favorite character and making them stronger exploring the world and finish ing the quests

overall it is an amazing game but there are a few bugs and not much to do in cooperative it glitch out sometimes when you are fighting and the screen stays frozen the story is great and all the character are fine as well but since the graphic are amazing it takes up a lot of space so it is just better to play on pc there is a lot to explore and to unlock on the map using the gacha is kinda worth using money on but you might end up only getting weak weapons

the game overall is really good great updates and event a beautiful and huge map to explore and it is not even complete yet not to talk about the lore which is awesome despite the fact that the company sometimes makes bad mistakes the late game experience being a bit boring and limited and the prices for in game purchases not being too good for some regions brazil as an example it is an awesome game and it is worth trying

good game graphic are well done with only a few wall issues for the most part the camera is responsive and in auto mode it usually stays well focused sometimes when in a small space the camera zooms in so far that you cannot see what you are doing the enemies and power scaling are fairly balanced mage and sword combat is smooth archers are a bit clumbsy overall still a good game that could use a few tweaks to be great

great game i enjoy playing it a lot i just have one issue whit the new event misty dungeon please make it so that enemies cannot get you stuck in walls it has happened multiple times and every time i have been pushed against a wall an enemy comes and somehow manages to stand below me while i get pushed in the air and stuck in a wall the worst part is that the only way to get out is for the enemy to move so i can get on the ground again but they just refuse to move please fix this problem

game runs pretty smoothly sometimes better than my pc but i have got a few issues cannot listen to music apps in the background because this app closes em it is pretty annoying after you switch apps for a second it takes you back to login loading screen sometimes it crashes for no reason saying game not responding four resin replen wish so slowly hour it should be six at least but even though it is pretty good graphic story character locations game mechanic are epic
